t: Amazon Shop the Look: A visual search system for fashion and home - Amazon Science
s: In this paper, we introduce Shop the Look, a web-scale fashion and home product visual search system deployed at Amazon. Building such a system poses great challenges to both science and engineering practices. We leverage large-scale image data from the Amazon product catalog and adopt effective ...
